SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with the latest offerings
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from people who have discovered great new products using our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has opened my eyes to so many innovative products I never knew existed. It's become my go-to for finding unique items.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As someone always on the lookout for the latest gadgets, this app has been a game-changer. The curated selection makes it easy to find cutting-edge products.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love supporting small businesses and independent creators, and this app is the perfect way to discover their exciting new offerings.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of cutting-edge products.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for New Product Launches
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know what you're looking for and we'll notify you about the latest products
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Stay connected with this stylish smart watch featuring fitness tracking and notifications.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Experience crystal clear audio with these noise-cancelling wireless headphones.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Never run out of battery with this high-capacity portable power bank for your devices.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Keep an eye on your home with this wire-free HD security camera with night vision.

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Enjoy room-filling sound from this compact and portable Bluetooth speaker.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge app that curates the latest and greatest products from around the world.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to scour the internet for the latest product releases across various categories. It then curates and presents these newly launched products to you in an easy-to-browse interface.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of products can I find?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can discover new products across a wide range of categories including technology, fashion, home goods, toys, and more. Our app aims to cover a diverse array of interests.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, the app is completely free to download and use. We do not charge any subscription fees or have in-app purchases.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often is the app updated with new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our team works continuously to ensure the app is updated with the latest product releases on a daily basis. You'll always have access to the newest and hottest items.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge product discovery platform.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you find and explore the latest products across various categories, from tech gadgets to lifestyle products. Stay up-to-date with the newest innovations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We curate and feature new product releases from trusted brands and startups. You can browse by category, search for specific items, and get detailed information and reviews.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, our app is completely free to download and use. We make money through affiliate partnerships when users make purchases through our links.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I follow specific brands or categories?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can customize your app experience by following your favorite brands or product categories. We'll notify you of any new releases that match your interests.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I provide feedback or suggestions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We value your input! You can submit feedback, report issues, or suggest new features directly within the app. We're constantly working to improve our product discovery experience.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Innovative Product Finder
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore a vast catalog of innovative and groundbreaking products from around the world. Stay ahead of the curve and be among the first to know about the latest game-changing inventions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our intelligent algorithms analyze your interests and preferences to curate a personalized feed of products tailored just for you. Never miss out on products that align with your passions.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get in-depth analysis and reviews from industry experts and early adopters. Make informed decisions about the products that pique your curiosity with comprehensive insights.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve by identifying emerging trends and product categories poised for growth. Our trend analysis tools help you spot opportunities before they go mainstream.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Join a vibrant community of product enthusiasts and share your thoughts, experiences, and feedback on the latest offerings. Collectively shape the future of innovation.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get exclusive early access to pre-release products, beta testing opportunities, and crowdfunding campaigns. Be among the first to experience groundbreaking innovations.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the latest innovations with our cutting-edge product finder app.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a world of groundbreaking products at your fingertips. Never miss out on the next big thing.
